currentDoc: Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.

 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.

This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.

This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.

There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that s

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.

There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.

There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.

John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly

This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.

There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. T

There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to ser

The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.

 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

Suddenly it was John's turn. He felt a cold stillness take over his body that he

 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

Suddenly it was John's turn. He felt a cold stillness take over his body that he had never felt before. An

There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

Suddenly it was John's turn. He felt a cold stillness take over his body that he had never felt before. And then suddenly it explod

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

Suddenly it was John's turn. He felt a cold stillness take over his body that he had never felt before. And then suddenly it exploded around him. The fake alien flew back against t

 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

Suddenly it was John's turn. He felt a cold stillness take over his body that he had never felt before. And then suddenly it exploded around him. The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the g

Suddenly it was John's turn. He felt a cold stillness take over his body that he had never felt before. And then suddenly it exploded around him. The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the ground in pieces. But no

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

Suddenly it was John's turn. He felt a cold stillness take over his body that he had never felt before. And then suddenly it exploded around him. The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the ground in pieces. But not only that, ther

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.

 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

Suddenly it was John's turn. He felt a cold stillness take over his body that he had never felt before. And then suddenly it exploded around him. The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the ground in pieces. But not only that, there was now a distinctive blue shield around Joh

The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the ground in pieces. But not only that, there was now a distinctive blue shield around John. He had done bother.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.

This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

Suddenly it was John's turn. He felt a cold stillness take over his body that he had never felt before. And then suddenly it exploded around him. The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the ground in pieces. But not only that, there was now a distinctive blue shield around John. He had done both.
The instructors were stunned.
 No one could spea

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

Suddenly it was John's turn. He felt a cold stillness take over his body that he had never felt before. And then suddenly it exploded around him. The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the ground in pieces. But not only that, there was now a distinctive blue shield around John. He had done both.
The instructors were stunned.
 No one could speak. Finally they told J

This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none.  While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

Suddenly it was John's turn. He felt a cold stillness take over his body that he had never felt before. And then suddenly it exploded around him. The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the ground in pieces. But not only that, there was now a distinctive blue shield around John. He had done both.
The instructors were stunned.
 No one could speak. Finally they told John to release his shield and shower and ge

The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the ground in pieces. But not only that, there was now a distinctive blue shield around John. He had done both.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

Suddenly it was John's turn. He felt a cold stillness take over his body that he had never felt before. And then suddenly it exploded around him. The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the ground in pieces. But not only that, there was now a distinctive blue shield around John. He had done both.
The instructors were stunned.
 No one could speak. Finally they told John to release his shield and shower and get ready for his next class. By the time he we

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

Suddenly it was John's turn. He felt a cold stillness take over his body that he had never felt before. And then suddenly it exploded around him. The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the ground in pieces. But not only that, there was now a distinctive blue shield around John. He had done both.
The instructors were stunned.
 No one could speak. Finally they told John to release his shield and shower and get ready for his next class. By the time he went home and had dinne

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

The instructors were stunned.

The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

Suddenly it was John's turn. He felt a cold stillness take over his body that he had never felt before. And then suddenly it exploded around him. The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the ground in pieces. But not only that, there was now a distinctive blue shield around John. He had done both.
The instructors were stunned.
 No one could speak. Finally they told John to release his shield and shower and get ready for his next class. By the time he went home and had dinner for his family, he had forgotten about

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.

John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

Suddenly it was John's turn. He felt a cold stillness take over his body that he had never felt before. And then suddenly it exploded around him. The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the ground in pieces. But not only that, there was now a distinctive blue shield around John. He had done both.
The instructors were stunned.
 No one could speak. Finally they told John to release his shield and shower and get ready for his next class. By the time he went home and had dinner for his family, he had forgotten about his display, but the

Suddenly it was John's turn. He felt a cold stillness take over his body that he had never felt before. And then suddenly it exploded around him. The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the ground in pieces. But not only that, there was now a distinctive blue shield around John. He had done both.
The instructors were stunned.
 No one could speak. Finally they told John to release his shield and shower and get ready for his next class. By the time he went home and had dinner for his family, he had forgotten about his display, but the school had not. The

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

Suddenly it was John's turn. He felt a cold stillness take over his body that he had never felt before. And then suddenly it exploded around him. The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the ground in pieces. But not only that, there was now a distinctive blue shield around John. He had done both.
The instructors were stunned.
 No one could speak. Finally they told John to release his shield and shower and get ready for his next class. By the time he went home and had dinner for his family, he had forgotten about his display, but the school had not. There was a knock at the d

This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

Suddenly it was John's turn. He felt a cold stillness take over his body that he had never felt before. And then suddenly it exploded around him. The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the ground in pieces. But not only that, there was now a distinctive blue shield around John. He had done both.
The instructors were stunned.
 No one could speak. Finally they told John to release his shield and shower and get ready for his next class. By the time he went home and had dinner for his family, he had forgotten about his display, but the school had not. There was a knock at the door and the hea

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

Suddenly it was John's turn. He felt a cold stillness take over his body that he had never felt before. And then suddenly it exploded around him. The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the ground in pieces. But not only that, there was now a distinctive blue shield around John. He had done both.
The instructors were stunned.
 No one could speak. Finally they told John to release his shield and shower and get ready for his next class. By the time he went home and had dinner for his family, he had forgotten about his display, but the school had not. There was a knock at the door and the headmaster and the hea

The instructors were stunned.
 No one could speak. Finally they told John to release his shield and shower and get ready for his next class. By the time he went home and had dinner for his family, he had forgotten about his display, but the school had not. There was a knock at the door and the headmaster and the head of security were

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

Suddenly it was John's turn. He felt a cold stillness take over his body that he had never felt before. And then suddenly it exploded around him. The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the ground in pieces. But not only that, there was now a distinctive blue shield around John. He had done both.
The instructors were stunned.
 No one could speak. Finally they told John to release his shield and shower and get ready for his next class. By the time he went home and had dinner for his family, he had forgotten about his display, but the school had not. Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

Suddenly it was John's turn. He felt a cold stillness take over his body that he had never felt before. And then suddenly it exploded around him. The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the ground in pieces. But not only that, there was now a distinctive blue shield around John. He had done both.
The instructors were stunned.
 No one could speak. Finally they told John to release his shield and shower and get ready for his next class. By the time he went home and had dinner for his family, he had forgotten about his display, but the school had not. There was a knock at the door and the headmaster and the head of security were ushered into the sitting room. They co

He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

Suddenly it was John's turn. He felt a cold stillness take over his body that he had never felt before. And then suddenly it exploded around him. The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the ground in pieces. But not only that, there was now a distinctive blue shield around John. He had done both.
The instructors were stunned.
 No one could speak. Finally they told John to release his shield and shower and get ready for his next class. By the time he went home and had dinner for his family, he had forgotten about his display, but the school had not. There was a knock at the door and the headmaster and the head of security were ushered into the sitting room. They conferred with John

The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the ground in pieces. But not only that, there was now a distinctive blue shield around John. He had done both.
The instructors were stunned.
 No one could speak. Finally they told John to release his shield and shower and get ready for his next class. By the time he went home and had dinner for his family, he had forgotten about his display, but the school had not. Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

By the time he went home and had dinner for his family, he had forgotten about his display, but the school had not. There was a knock at the door and the headmaster and the head of security were ushered into the sitting room. They conferred with John's parents for quite some time.
"John, we have some good news for you," his father said.
 " Yo

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

Suddenly it was John's turn. He felt a cold stillness take over his body that he had never felt before. And then suddenly it exploded around him. The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the ground in pieces. But not only that, there was now a distinctive blue shield around John. He had done both.
The instructors were stunned.
 No one could speak. Finally they told John to release his shield and shower and get ready for his next class. By the time he went home and had dinner for his family, he had forgotten about his display, but the school had not. There was a knock at the door and the headmaster and the head of security were ushered into the sitting room. They conferred with John's parents for quite some time.
"John, we have some good news for you," his father said.
 " You

 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

Suddenly it was John's turn. He felt a cold stillness take over his body that he had never felt before. And then suddenly it exploded around him. The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the ground in pieces. But not only that, there was now a distinctive blue shield around John. He had done both.
The instructors were stunned.
 No one could speak. Finally they told John to release his shield and shower and get ready for his next class. By the time he went home and had dinner for his family, he had forgotten about his display, but the school had not. There was a knock at the door and the headmaster and the head of security were ushered into the sitting room. They conferred with John's parents for quite some time.
"John, we have some good news for you," his father said.

There was a knock at the door and the headmaster and the head of security were ushered into the sitting room. They conferred with John's parents for quite some time.
"John, we have some good news for you," his father said.
 " You are going to be given an opportuni

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

Suddenly it was John's turn. He felt a cold stillness take over his body that he had never felt before. And then suddenly it exploded around him. The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the ground in pieces. But not only that, there was now a distinctive blue shield around John. He had done both.
The instructors were stunned.
 No one could speak. Finally they told John to release his shield and shower and get ready for his next class. By the time he went home and had dinner for his family, he had forgotten about his display, but the school had not. There was a knock at the door and the headmaster and the head of security were ushered into the sitting room. They conferred with John's parents for quite some time.
"John, we have some good news for you," his father said.

John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

Suddenly it was John's turn. He felt a cold stillness take over his body that he had never felt before. And then suddenly it exploded around him. The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the ground in pieces. But not only that, there was now a distinctive blue shield around John. He had done both.
The instructors were stunned.
 No one could speak. Finally they told John to release his shield and shower and get ready for his next class. By the time he went home and had dinner for his family, he had forgotten about his display, but the school had not. There was a knock at the door and the headmaster and the head of security were ushered into the sitting room. They conferred with John's parents for quite some time.
"John, we have some good news for you," his father said.
 " You are going to be given an opportunity that most can on

A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

Suddenly it was John's turn. He felt a cold stillness take over his body that he had never felt before. And then suddenly it exploded around him. The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the ground in pieces. But not only that, there was now a distinctive blue shield around John. He had done both.
The instructors were stunned.
 No one could speak. Finally they told John to release his shield and shower and get ready for his next class. By the time he went home and had dinner for his family, he had forgotten about his display, but the school had not. There was a knock at the door and the headmaster and the head of security were ushered into the sitting room. They conferred with John's parents for quite some time.
"John, we have some good news for you," his father said.
 " You are going to be given an opportunity that most can only dream of.

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.

The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the ground in pieces. But not only that, there was now a distinctive blue shield around John. He had done both.
The instructors were stunned.
 No one could speak. Finally they told John to release his shield and shower and get ready for his next class. By the time he went home and had dinner for his family, he had forgotten about his display, but the school had not. There was a knock at the door and the headmaster and the head of security were ushered into the sitting room. They conferred with John's parents for quite some time.
"John, we have some good news for you," his father said.
 " You are going to be given an opportunity that most can only dream of."

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.

The fake alien flew back against the wall with such force that it clattered to the ground in pieces. But not only that, there was now a distinctive blue shield around John. He had done both.
The instructors were stunned.
 No one could speak. Finally they told John to release his shield and shower and get ready for his next class. By the time he went home and had dinner for his family, he had forgotten about his display, but the school had not. There was a knock at the door and the headmaster and the head of security were ushered into the sitting room. They conferred with John's parents for quite some time.
"John, we have some good news for you," his father said.
 " You are going to be given an opportunity that most can only dream of." 
"You are going to the capital" Th

Humans once wielded formidable magical power. But with over 7 billion of us on the planet now, Mana has spread far too thinly to have any effect. When hostile aliens reduce humanity to a mere fraction, the survivors discover an old power has begun to reawaken once again.
This is a story of the end of the world, and the beginning of the next.
 John was the second generation to start to have noticeable powers. It was almost something that he had taken for granted, as he did not know what it was like before to have none. There were now classes in the little school to teach the children how to harness their Mana and use it, in the hopes that one day a generation would be strong enough to take back their home.
John was now in his final year of school, and was one of the stronger students.
 While he was stronger, he was still not considered unusual, as there had been far more impressive people he had learned about in his history class. He didn't know that one day that was about to change and he could hold the key to restoring order on his earth.
He was a tall, well-built young man with short brown hair and a friendly face.
 Nothing that spoke to the powers that were laying in wait inside him. It was during a practice exercise that he began to feel different. The goal was to either provide a shield around yourself, or blast away a fake alien that was in the fight room. A good student could be fairly impressive at one, although no one was really that great. The instructors hoped that with practice though, the children would be powerful enough when they grew up to serve the security force well.
